QuestData.Title: Zovaal's Grasp
QuestData.Description:
I remember this metal. I saw it when I was touched by Maw magic. When I was severed...
I will show you where this happened. Follow me. I will tell you my story.
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow Hanoa the Exile and listen to her story.
QuestData.RewardText: It is worse than I thought. Much worse.

Objectives.Objective: Follow Hanoa the Exile and listen to her story
